Event: ... panic attack rollercoaster... black hole of hopeless nothingness... dead and hopeless... no point in the future.
Post: "I'm stuck in a rut and can't seem to shake off this feeling of hopelessness. I must be inherently flawed or cursed."

Event: Mental exhaustion from trying to figure out one's passion and creative side, leading to social anxiety, perfectionism, lack of trust, depression, and envy.
Post: "I'm always struggling to find my passion and creative side, and it's leaving me mentally exhausted. I feel like I'll never be good enough, and it's causing me to become a perfectionist, which is leading to social anxiety, lack of trust, depression, and even envy towards others who seem to have it all figured out."

Event: Feeling incredibly tired and lethargic, procrastination, lack of motivation, bad thoughts, fear of one's own brain, feeling at a new low point in life, considering giving up on being happy.
Post: "I'm always feeling exhausted and unmotivated because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Going to college has been the worst experience for the individual.
Post: "Going to college has been a nightmare for me because I'm just not cut out for higher education."

Event: The death of the writer's dad's girlfriend, which has caused them emotional distress and confusion.
Post:
"I'm still reeling from the sudden loss of my dad's girlfriend. It's like the world has come crashing down around me and I can't seem to find my footing. I keep thinking it's all just a bad dream, but the pain is all too real. 

I can't help but wonder if this is all my fault. Maybe if I had been a better daughter, she would still be here with us. The guilt and regret are suffocating me, and I don't know how to move forward. It feels like a part of me has been torn away, leaving a gaping hole that I don't know how to fill. 

I'm trying to hold on to the memories, but they're slipping away from me too. All I can think about is what could have been, what should have been. It's like my mind is trapped in a never-ending cycle of grief and self-blame. When will the pain subside? When will I be able to breathe again without feeling like I'm drowning in sorrow?"

Event: Calling a hotline because you wanted to die and panicking when a woman called your parents.
Post: "I'm so sorry that I'm just not cut out for this life. I'll never be able to handle the stress and pressure of being an adult."

Event: Taking anti-depressants and starting to feel something after being numb for a long time.
Post: "I'm finally starting to feel something again after being numb for so long, and it's all thanks to my naturally sensitive nature that I'm able to experience emotions so deeply."

Event: Going to school is easy for some people while feeling difficult and frustrating for others.
Post: "Why do I always struggle with school? It's because I'm just not cut out for it."

Event: A person is experiencing a social anxiety issue that makes it difficult for them to speak in public, resulting in feelings of fear and embarrassment.
Post: "I'm always too nervous to speak up in public because I'm just naturally shy and introverted."

Event: Losing a friend to suicide and being diagnosed with depression and borderline personality disorder.
Post: "I lost my friend to suicide and I've been diagnosed with depression and borderline personality disorder because I'm just naturally prone to negative thoughts and emotions."
